author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nvidia CEO Huang Says Investment In Self-Driving Technology Will Rise, Not Fall, In Aftermath Of Uber Fatality‍​
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Nvidia CEO said in a Q & A after keynote speech at GPU Conference in San Jose, California:
* NVIDIA CEO SAYS INVESTMENT IN SELF-DRIVING TECHNOLOGY WILL RISE, NOT FALL, IN AFTERMATH OF UBER FATALITY‍​
* NVIDIA CEO SAYS UBER FATALITY SHOULD NOT DISCOURAGE SELF-DRIVING DEVELOPMENT, BUT “BRING AWARENESS TO THE IMPORTANCE OF IT”
* NVIDIA CEO SAYS UBER SHOULD BE GIVEN CHANCE TO UNDERSTAND WHAT WENT WRONG, “WE DON’T KNOW WHAT HAPPENED” Further company coverage:
